file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-51-02-04 - BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the baggage door lining. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-51-02-000-801-A BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - REMOVAL BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - INSTALLA- ALL 25-51-02-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-51-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-51-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the baggage door lining. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 52-30-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage compartment 1 Helps the other technician Baggage compartment I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: ASK FOR HELP TO REMOVE THE BAGGAGE DOOR TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO MATERIAL AND INJURY TO PERSONS. (1) Remove the baggage door AMM TASK 52-30-01-000-801-A/400. CAUTION: PUT THE BAGGAGE DOOR IN A SAFE PLACE TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (2) Remove the screws (6) and washers (5) that attach the forward trim (1). (3) Remove the screws (4) and washers (3) that attach the baggage door forward-edge lining (2). (4) Remove the screws (7) and washers (8) that attach the bottom trim (10). (5) Remove the screws (14) and washers (15) that attach the aft trim (16). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-51-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Remove the screws (12) and washers (13) that attach the baggage door aft-edge lining (11). (7) Remove the screws (18) and washers (19) that attach the top trim (17). (8) Remove the screws (20) and washers (21) that attach the baggage door lining (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-51-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Baggage Door Lining – Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 813 17. TOP TRIM 14. SCREW 15. WASHER 18. SCREW 19. WASHER 20. SCREW 21. WASHER 12. SCREW 2. BAGGAGE DOOR FORWARD-EDGE 13. WASHER LINING 1. FORWARD TRIM 16. AFT TRIM 11. BAGGAGE DOOR AFT-EDGE LINING 10. BOTTOM TRIM 3. WASHER 4. SCREW 9. BAGGAGE DOOR LINING 5. WASHER 6. SCREW DET. A 8. WASHER 145AMM250109.MCE B 7. SCREW EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-51-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-51-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the baggage door lining. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 52-30-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage compartment 1 Helps the other technician Baggage compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A CAUTION: PUT THE BAGGAGE DOOR IN A SAFE PLACE TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) NOTE: To install a new lining, it is necessary to transfer the holes from the door frame to the lining. Install the baggage door lining (9) with the screws (20) and washers (21). (2) Install the top trim (17) with the screws (18) and washers (19). (3) Install the baggage door aft-edge lining (11) with the screws (12) and washers (13). (4) Install the aft trim (16) with the screws (14) and washers (15). (5) Install the bottom trim (10) with the screws (7) and washers (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-51-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Install the baggage door forward-edge lining (2) with the screws (4) and washers (3). (7) Install the forward trim (1) with the screws (6) and washers (5). WARNING: ASK FOR HELP TO INSTALL THE BAGGAGE DOOR TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO MATERIAL AND INJURY TO PERSONS. (8) Install the baggage door AMM TASK 52-30-01-400-801-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-51-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
